name: Pakistan Air Force Act, 2017
tagline: An Act further to amend the Pakistan Air Force Act, 1953.

EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
ISLAMABAD, SATURDAY, MAY 27, 2017 
PART I 
Acts, Ordinances, President's Orders and Regulations 
SENATE SECRETARIAT 
Islamabad, the 26th May, 2017 
No. F. 9 (13)/2017-Legis.—The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora 
(Parliament) received the assent of the President on 23rd May, 2017 and is hereby 
published for general information:— 
ACT NO. XWII OF 2017 
An Act further to amend the Pakistan Air Force Act, 1953 
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Pakistan Air Force Act, 1953 
(VI of 1953), for the purpose hereinafter appearing; 
It is hereby enacted as follows:- 
1. 	Short title and commencement.— (1) This act may be called the 
Pakistan Air Force (Amendment)Act, 2017. 
(2) 	It shall come into force at once and shall be deemed to have taken 
effect on and from the 1st January, 2000. 
(179) 
Price: Its 2.00 
[730 (2017)/Ex. Gaz.] 
180 	THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., MAY 27,2017 	[PART I 
2. 	Amendment of section 121, Act VI of 1953.— In the Pakistan 
Air Force Act, 1953 (VI of 1953), in section 121, in sub-section (3), after the figure 
"37", the words and figure "or section 52" shall be inserted. 
MUHAMMAD ANWAR, 
Acting Secretaty. 
PRINTED BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, ISLAMABAD. 
PUBLISHED BY THE DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD, KARACHI.
